title: Sora no Otoshimono: Project Pink (Heaven's Lost Property OVA)
synopsis: The gang goes to an indoor swimming pool for some fun in the sun.  As expected, all hell breaks loose when Tomoki goes on one of his perverted missions.
voices: ['Hayami, Saori', 'Hoshi, Souichirou', 'Nomizu, Iori', 'Mina', 'Suzuki, Tatsuhisa', 'Takagaki, Ayahi', 'Iwasaki, Hiroshi']
